t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Can I Create a new Brand under a company that already ...
s: You can have more than one of your own brands on an Amazon account · However if you mean can you create a sub brand for product that already has a brand name. - yes if its a private label product it is possible but only if you get permission from the supplier / main brand owner in writing.
